text: It has more of the household items you need, including batteries of many sizes, paint brushes of different sizes, taps fittings, earphones, lighters, sewing kits, hardware (hammer, screwdrivers, brooms). They have calling cards too and cigarettes. Closes at 9pm. There is a OCBC ATM teller just outside the shop (see attached image). Customer service is quite lacking and you have to know what you need. Accept cash payment only. Otherwise, one important place to get your home-fixes in this area.
